critique: The initial scores seem reasonable given the document's focus on security and enforcement. However, I will slightly adjust the scores to better reflect the nuances of the intended emotional impact. I will increase the 'fear' score to emphasize the perceived threat from removable aliens and the 'joy' score to reflect the satisfaction of fulfilling campaign promises and ensuring public safety. I will also slightly decrease the 'sadness' score as the document primarily focuses on enforcement rather than expressing sorrow.
